official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, the Federal Alcohol Administration Act, and the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to provide for Health Warning Labels on alcoholic beverages and cigarettes.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Amends the Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, the Federal Alcohol Administration Act, and the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to authorize and direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to prescribe health warning labels to appear on alcoholic beverages and cigarettes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, the Federal Alcohol Administration Act, and the Federal Cigarette Labeling and Advertising Act to provide for Health Warning Labels on alcoholic beverages and cigarettes.
